anya-e0102n10:2_2: taṁ maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāniyattā neva paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṁ na ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṁ bhajati,
anya-e0102n10:2_4: Vipassanāsote patitattā pana vipassanāti saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0102n10:2_5: Sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo arahattamaggoti imesu pana catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṁ ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
anya-e0102n10:3_0: Tattha paṭhamamaggañāṇaṁ tāva sampādetukāmena aññaṁ kiñci kātabbaṁ nāma natthi.
anya-e0102n10:3_3: Evaṁ uppannaanulomañāṇassa panassa tehi tīhipi anulomañāṇehi attano balānurūpena thūlathūle saccapaṭicchādake
anya-e0102n10:3_4: tamamhi antaradhāpite sabbasaṅkhāragatesu cittaṁ na pakkhandati,
anya-e0102n10:3_10: Padumapalāsato udakaṁ viya patilīyati patikuṭati pativattati.
anya-e0102n10:3_11: Sabbaṁ nimittārammaṇampi sabbaṁ pavattārammaṇampi palibodhato upaṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n10:3_12: Athassa sabbasmiṁ nimittapavattārammaṇe palibodhato upaṭṭhite anulomañāṇassa āsevanante animittaṁ appavattaṁ
anya-e0102n10:3_13: visaṅkhāraṁ nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ kurumānaṁ puthujjanagottaṁ puthujjanasaṅkhaṁ puthujjanabhūmiṁ
anya-e0102n10:3_14: atikkamamānaṁ ariyagottaṁ ariyasaṅkhaṁ ariyabhūmiṁ okkamamānaṁ nibbānārammaṇe paṭhamāvaṭṭanapaṭhamābhogapaṭhamasamannāhārabhūtaṁ
anya-e0102n10:3_16: sikhāppattaṁ vipassanāya muddhabhūtaṁ apunarāvaṭṭakaṁ uppajjati gotrabhuñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:5_8: Uppādaṁ abhibhuyyitvā anuppādaṁ pakkhandatīti gotrabhū”ti sabbaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:6_1: Tatrāyaṁ ekāvajjanena ekavīthiyaṁ pavattamānānampi anulomagotrabhūnaṁ nānārammaṇe pavattanākāradīpikā upamā –
anya-e0102n10:6_2: yathā hi mahāmātikaṁ laṅghitvā paratīre patiṭṭhātukāmo puriso vegena dhāvitvā mātikāya orimatīre rukkhasākhāya
anya-e0102n10:6_3: bandhitvā olambitaṁ rajjuṁ vā yaṭṭhiṁ vā gahetvā ullaṅghitvā paratīraninnapoṇapabbhārakāyo hutvā paratīrassa
anya-e0102n10:6_4: uparibhāgaṁ patto taṁ muñcitvā vedhamāno paratīre patitvā saṇikaṁ patiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n10:6_5: evamevāyaṁ yogāvacaropi bhavayonigatiṭṭhitinivāsānaṁ paratīrabhūte nibbāne patiṭṭhātukāmo udayabbayānupassanādinā
anya-e0102n10:6_6: vegena dhāvitvā attabhāvarukkhasākhāya bandhitvā olambitaṁ rūparajjuṁ vā vedanādīsu aññataradaṇḍaṁ vā
anya-e0102n10:6_7: aniccanti vā dukkhanti vā anattāti vāti anulomāvajjanena gahetvā taṁ amuñcamānova paṭhamena anulomacittena
anya-e0102n10:6_8: ullaṅghitvā dutiyena paratīraninnapoṇapabbhārakāyo viya nibbānaninnapoṇapabbhāramānaso hutvā tatiyena
anya-e0102n10:6_9: paratīrassa uparibhāgaṁ patto viya idāni pattabbassa nibbānassa āsanno hutvā tassa cittassa nirodhena
anya-e0102n10:6_10: taṁ saṅkhārārammaṇaṁ muñcitvā gotrabhucittena visaṅkhāre paratīrabhūte nibbāne patati.
anya-e0102n10:6_11: Ekārammaṇe pana aladdhāsevanatāya vedhamāno so puriso viya na tāva suppatiṭṭhito hoti,
anya-e0102n10:7_1: Tattha anulomaṁ saccapaṭicchādakaṁ kilesatamaṁ vinodetuṁ sakkoti,
anya-e0102n10:7_6: eko kira cakkhumā puriso “nakkhattayogaṁ jānissāmī”ti rattibhāge nikkhamitvā candaṁ passituṁ uddhaṁ ullokesi,
anya-e0102n10:7_7: tassa valāhakehi paṭicchannattā cando na paññāyittha.
anya-e0102n10:7_8: Atheko vāto uṭṭhahitvā thūlathūle valāhake viddhaṁseti.
anya-e0102n10:7_11: Tato so puriso vigatavalāhake nabhe candaṁ disvā nakkhattayogaṁ aññāsi.
anya-e0102n10:8_0: Tattha tayo valāhakā viya saccapaṭicchādakathūlamajjhimasukhumaṁ kilesandhakāraṁ,
anya-e0102n10:8_4: ekekassa vātassa yathākkamena valāhakaviddhaṁsanaṁ viya ekekassa anulomacittassa saccapaṭicchādakatamavinodanaṁ,
anya-e0102n10:8_5: vigatavalāhake nabhe tassa purisassa visuddhacandadassanaṁ viya vigate saccapaṭicchādake tame gotrabhuñāṇassa visuddhanibbānadassanaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:9_0: Yatheva hi tayo vātā candapaṭicchādake valāhakeyeva viddhaṁsetuṁ sakkonti,
anya-e0102n10:9_2: evaṁ anulomāni saccapaṭicchādakaṁ tamaññeva vinodetuṁ sakkonti,
anya-e0102n10:9_4: Yathā so puriso candameva daṭṭhuṁ sakkoti,
anya-e0102n10:9_9: Tañhi anāvajjanampi samānaṁ āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā “evaṁ nibbattāhī”ti maggassa saññaṁ datvā viya nirujjhati.
anya-e0102n10:9_10: Maggopi tena dinnasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva avīcisantativasena taṁ ñāṇaṁ anuppabandhamāno anibbiddhapubbaṁ apadālitapubbaṁ
anya-e0102n10:9_11: lobhakkhandhaṁ dosakkhandhaṁ mohakkhandhaṁ nibbijjhamānova padālayamānova nibbattati.
anya-e0102n10:10_2: eko kira issāso aṭṭhausabhamatte padese phalakasataṁ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena mukhaṁ veṭhetvā saraṁ sannahitvā cakkayante aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0102n10:10_3: Añño puriso cakkayantaṁ āvijjhitvā yadā issāsassa phalakaṁ abhimukhaṁ hoti,
anya-e0102n10:10_5: Issāso daṇḍakasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva saraṁ khipitvā phalakasataṁ nibbijjhati.
anya-e0102n10:10_8: Issāsassa daṇḍakasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva phalakasatanibbijjhanaṁ viya maggañāṇassa gotrabhuñāṇena dinnasaññaṁ
anya-e0102n10:10_9: amuñcitvāva nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā anibbiddhapubbānaṁ apadālitapubbānaṁ lobhadosamohakkhandhānaṁ nibbijjhanapadālanaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:11_1: Na kevalañcesa maggo lobhakkhandhādīnaṁ nibbijjhanameva karoti,
anya-e0102n10:11_8: aññesañca anekasatānaṁ ānisaṁsānaṁ paṭilābhāya saṁvattatīti evaṁ anekānisaṁsadāyakena sotāpattimaggena sampayuttaṁ ñāṇaṁ sotāpattimagge ñāṇanti.
anya-e0102n10:14_1: Imassa pana ñāṇassa anantaraṁ tasseva vipākabhūtāni dve tīṇi vā phalacittāni uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n10:14_2: Anantaravipākattāyeva hi lokuttarakusalānaṁ “samādhimānantarikaññamāhū”ti ca “dandhaṁ ānantarikaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāyā”ti ca ādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:14_3: Keci pana ekaṁ dve tīṇi cattāri vā phalacittānīti vadanti,
anya-e0102n10:15_1: Tasmā sabbantimena paricchedena dvīhi anulomacittehi bhavitabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:15_5: tassa tatiyaṁ gotrabhu catutthaṁ maggacittaṁ tīṇi phalacittāni honti.
anya-e0102n10:15_7: tassa catutthaṁ gotrabhu pañcamaṁ maggacittaṁ dve phalacittāni honti.
anya-e0102n10:15_8: Tena vuttaṁ “dve tīṇi vā phalacittāni uppajjantī”ti.
anya-e0102n10:16_1: tassa pañcamaṁ gotrabhu chaṭṭhaṁ maggacittaṁ ekaṁ phalacittanti vadanti,
anya-e0102n10:16_2: taṁ pana yasmā catutthaṁ pañcamaṁ vā appeti,
anya-e0102n10:17_1: Ettāvatā ca panesa sotāpanno nāma dutiyo ariyapuggalo hoti.
anya-e0102n10:17_2: Bhusaṁ pamattopi hutvā sattakkhattuṁ devesu ca manussesu ca sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā dukkhassantassa karaṇasamattho hoti.
anya-e0102n10:17_4: tato bhavaṅgaṁ upacchinditvā maggapaccavekkhaṇatthāya uppajjati manodvārāvajjanaṁ,
anya-e0102n10:17_6: Puna bhavaṅgaṁ otaritvā teneva nayena phalādīnaṁ paccavekkhaṇatthāya āvajjanādīni uppajjanti.
anya-e0102n10:18_0: So hi “iminā vatāhaṁ maggena āgato”ti maggaṁ paccavekkhati,
anya-e0102n10:18_1: tato “ayaṁ me ānisaṁso laddho”ti phalaṁ paccavekkhati.
anya-e0102n10:18_2: Tato “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīnakilese paccavekkhati.
anya-e0102n10:18_3: Tato “ime nāma me kilesā avasiṭṭhā”ti uparimaggattayavajjhe kilese paccavekkhati.
anya-e0102n10:18_4: Avasāne ca “ayaṁ me dhammo ārammaṇato paṭividdho”ti amataṁ nibbānaṁ paccavekkhati.
anya-e0102n10:18_5: Iti sotāpannassa ariyasāvakassa pañca paccavekkhaṇāni honti.
anya-e0102n10:19_1: Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇañhi sekkhānampi hoti vā na vā.
anya-e0102n10:19_2: Tassa hi paccavekkhaṇassa abhāveneva mahānāmo bhagavantaṁ pucchi “kosu nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṁ appahīno,
anya-e0102n10:19_3: yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti sabbaṁ vitthārato veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:21_1: Evaṁ paccavekkhitvā pana so sotāpanno ariyasāvako tasmiññeva vā āsane nisinno,
anya-e0102n10:21_2: aparena vā samayena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanubhāvāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyā yogaṁ karoti.
anya-e0102n10:21_3: So indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā tadeva rūpavedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇabhedaṁ saṅkhāragataṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti ñāṇena parimaddati,
anya-e0102n10:21_6: Tassevaṁ paṭipannassa vuttanayeneva saṅkhārupekkhāvasāne ekāvajjanena anulomagotrabhuñāṇesu uppannesu gotrabhuanantaraṁ sakadāgāmimaggo uppajjati.
anya-e0102n10:24_1: Imassāpi ñāṇassa anantaraṁ vuttanayeneva phalacittāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n10:24_2: Ettāvatā cesa sakadāgāmī nāma catuttho ariyapuggalo hoti sakiṁdeva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantakaraṇasamattho.
anya-e0102n10:25_0: Evaṁ paccavekkhitvā ca so sakadāgāmī ariyasāvako tasmiññeva vā āsane nisinno aparena vā samayena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ
anya-e0102n10:25_1: anavasesappahānāya tatiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyā yogaṁ karoti,
anya-e0102n10:25_2: so indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā tadeva saṅkhāragataṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti ñāṇena parimaddati,
anya-e0102n10:25_5: Tassevaṁ paṭipannassa vuttanayeneva saṅkhārupekkhāvasāne ekāvajjanena anulomagotrabhuñāṇesu uppannesu gotrabhuanantaraṁ anāgāmimaggo uppajjati,
anya-e0102n10:28_1: Imassapi ñāṇassa anantaraṁ vuttanayeneva phalacittāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n10:28_2: Ettāvatā cesa anāgāmī nāma chaṭṭho ariyapuggalo hoti opapātiko tatthaparinibbāyī anāvattidhammo paṭisandhivasena imaṁ lokaṁ puna anāgantā.
anya-e0102n10:29_0: Evaṁ paccavekkhitvā ca so anāgāmī ariyasāvako tasmiññeva vā āsane nisinno,
anya-e0102n10:29_1: aparena vā samayena rūpārūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjānaṁ anavasesappahānāya catutthāya bhūmiyā pattiyā yogaṁ karoti,
anya-e0102n10:29_2: so indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā tadeva saṅkhāragataṁ aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti ñāṇena parimaddati,
anya-e0102n10:29_5: Tassevaṁ paṭipannassa vuttanayeneva saṅkhārupekkhāvasāne ekāvajjanena anulomagotrabhuñāṇesu uppannesu gotrabhuanantaraṁ arahattamaggo uppajjati,
anya-e0102n10:32_1: Imassapi ñāṇassa anantaraṁ vuttanayeneva phalacittāni veditabbāni.
anya-e0102n10:32_2: Ettāvatā cesa arahā nāma aṭṭhamo ariyapuggalo hoti mahākhīṇāsavo antimadehadhārī ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho
anya-e0102n10:32_3: parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammādaññā vimutto sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyoti.
anya-e0102n10:33_0: Iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ “sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo arahattamaggoti imesu pana catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṁ ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāmā”ti,
anya-e0102n10:33_1: taṁ imāni iminā anukkamena pattabbāni cattāri ñāṇāni sandhāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:37_0: Ye yena pahātabbā, dhammā tesaṁ pahānañca.
anya-e0102n10:40_9: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti hi ime sattatiṁsa dhammā bujjhanaṭṭhena bodhoti laddhanāmassa ariyamaggassa pakkhe bhavattā bodhipakkhiyā nāma.
anya-e0102n10:41_1: Tesu tesu ārammaṇesu okkhanditvā pakkhanditvā upaṭṭhānato paṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:41_5: saññāpahānakiccasādhanavasena ca pavattito catudhā bhedo hoti.
anya-e0102n10:42_4: Sobhanaṁ vā taṁ kilesavirūpattavirahato padhānañca hitasukhanipphādakattena seṭṭhabhāvāvahanato padhānabhāvakāraṇato cāti sammappadhānaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:42_6: Tayidaṁ uppannānuppannānaṁ akusalānaṁ pahānānuppattikiccaṁ anuppannuppannānañca kusalānaṁ uppattiṭṭhitikiccaṁ sādhayatīti catubbidhaṁ hoti,
anya-e0102n10:43_2: Tassā sampayuttāya pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena phalabhūtāya pubbabhāgakāraṇaṭṭhena ca iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo.
anya-e0102n10:43_7: Lokiyā pana “chandañce bhikkhu adhipatiṁ karitvā labhati samādhiṁ,
anya-e0102n10:43_9: Ayaṁ vuccati chandasamādhī”tiādivacanato chandādiadhipativasena paṭiladdhadhammāpi honti.
anya-e0102n10:45_1: Bujjhanakasattassa pana aṅgabhāvena satiādayo satta bojjhaṅgā.
anya-e0102n10:45_2: Niyyānikaṭṭhena ca sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha maggaṅgā honti.
anya-e0102n10:45_3: Tena vuttaṁ “satta bojjhaṅgā ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti.
anya-e0102n10:46_1: Iti ime sattatiṁsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā pubbabhāge lokiyavipassanāya vattamānāya cuddasavidhena kāyaṁ pariggaṇhato ca kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0102n10:46_5: Imasmiṁ attabhāve anuppannapubbaṁ parassa uppannaṁ akusalaṁ disvā “yathā paṭipannassetaṁ uppannaṁ,
anya-e0102n10:46_6: na tathā paṭipajjissāmi evaṁ me etaṁ nuppajjissatī”ti,
anya-e0102n10:46_8: Attano samudācārappattaṁ akusalaṁ disvā tassa pahānāya vāyamanakāle dutiyaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:46_9: Imasmiṁ attabhāve anuppannapubbaṁ jhānaṁ vā vipassanaṁ vā uppādetuṁ vāyamantassa tatiyaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:46_13: Micchāvācāya viramaṇakāle sammāvācāti evaṁ nānācittesu labbhanti.
anya-e0102n10:46_14: Imesaṁ pana catunnaṁ ñāṇānaṁ uppattikāle ekacitte labbhanti.
anya-e0102n10:46_15: Phalakkhaṇe ṭhapetvā cattāro sammappadhāne avasesā tettiṁsa labbhanti.
anya-e0102n10:47_1: Evaṁ ekacitte labbhamānesu cetesu ekāva nibbānārammaṇā sati kāyādīsu subhasaññādippahānakiccasādhanavasena cattāro satipaṭṭhānāti vuccati.
anya-e0102n10:47_2: Ekameva ca vīriyaṁ anuppannānaṁ anuppādādikiccasādhanavasena cattāro sammappadhānāti vuccati.
anya-e0102n10:49_0: Nava ekavidhā eko, dvedhātha catu pañcadhā;
anya-e0102n10:50_0: Aṭṭhadhā navadhā ceva, iti chaddhā bhavanti te.
anya-e0102n10:51_2: ājīvoti ime nava chandiddhipādādivasena ekavidhāva honti,
anya-e0102n10:51_6: Atha catu pañcadhāti athañño eko catudhā,
anya-e0102n10:51_11: Paññā tesañca catunnaṁ iddhipādakoṭṭhāsassa ca vasena pañcadhā.
anya-e0102n10:51_12: Aṭṭhadhā navadhā cevāti aparo eko aṭṭhadhā,
anya-e0102n10:58_1: Lokiyavipassanā hi nimittārammaṇattā ceva pavattikāraṇassa ca samudayassa asamucchindanato neva nimittā na pavattā vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n10:58_2: Gotrabhuñāṇaṁ samudayassa asamucchindanato pavattā na vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n10:58_3: Nibbānārammaṇato pana nimittā vuṭṭhātīti ekato vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:58_7: Imāni pana cattāripi ñāṇāni animittārammaṇattā nimittato vuṭṭhahanti,
anya-e0102n10:58_8: samudayassa samucchindanato pavattā vuṭṭhahantīti dubhato vuṭṭhānāni honti.
anya-e0102n10:61_3: Tena vuccati dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:61_13: Tena vuccati ‘dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇa’nti.
anya-e0102n10:62_1: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi oḷārikā kāmarāgasaṁyojanā paṭighasaṁyojanā oḷārikā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti…pe….
anya-e0102n10:63_1: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi anusahagatā kāmarāgasaṁyojanā paṭighasaṁyojanā anusahagatā kāmarāgānusayā paṭighānusayā vuṭṭhāti…pe….
anya-e0102n10:64_1: avikkhepaṭṭhena sammāsamādhi rūparāgā arūparāgā mānā uddhaccā avijjāya mānānusayā bhavarāgānusayā avijjānusayā vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n10:64_4: Tena vuccati ‘dubhato vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane paññā magge ñāṇa”’nti.
anya-e0102n10:65_1: Lokiyānañca aṭṭhannaṁ samāpattīnaṁ bhāvanākāle samathabalaṁ adhikaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:65_3: Ariyamaggakkhaṇe pana yuganaddhā te dhammā pavattanti aññamaññaṁ anativattanaṭṭhena.
anya-e0102n10:65_4: Tasmā imesu catūsupi ñāṇesu ubhayabalasamāyogo hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n10:66_0: “Uddhaccasahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhahato cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samādhi nirodhagocaro,
anya-e0102n10:66_1: avijjāsahagatakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhahato anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanā nirodhagocarā.
anya-e0102n10:66_5: Tena vuccati vuṭṭhānaṭṭhena samathavipassanaṁ yuganaddhaṁ bhāvetī”ti.
anya-e0102n10:69_1: tesaṁ pahānañcāti imesu pana catūsu ñāṇesu ye dhammā yena ñāṇena pahātabbā,
anya-e0102n10:70_0: Tattha saṁyojanānīti khandhehi khandhānaṁ phalena kammassa dukkhena vā sattānaṁ saṁyojakattā rūparāgādayo dasa dhammā vuccanti.
anya-e0102n10:70_3: Tatrāpi rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṁ avijjāti ime pañca uddhaṁnibbattanakakhandhādisaṁyojakattā uddhaṁbhāgiyasaṁyojanāni nāma.
anya-e0102n10:70_4: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso kāmarāgo paṭighoti ime pañca adhonibbattanakakhandhādisaṁyojakattā adhobhāgiyasaṁyojanāni nāma.
anya-e0102n10:71_0: Kilesāti sayaṁ saṁkiliṭṭhattā sampayuttadhammānañca saṁkilesikattā lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā
anya-e0102n10:71_1: thinaṁ uddhaccaṁ ahirikaṁ anottappanti ime dasa dhammā.
anya-e0102n10:72_0: Micchattāti micchāpavattanato micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvācā micchākammanto micchāājīvo micchāvāyāmo
anya-e0102n10:73_0: Lokadhammāti lokappavattiyā sati anuparamadhammakattā lābho alābho yaso ayaso sukhaṁ dukkhaṁ nindā pasaṁsāti ime aṭṭha.
anya-e0102n10:73_1: Idha pana kāraṇopacārena lābhādivatthukassa anunayassa alābhādivatthukassa paṭighassa cetaṁ lokadhammaggahaṇena gahaṇaṁ katanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:74_0: Macchariyānīti āvāsamacchariyaṁ kulamacchariyaṁ lābhamacchariyaṁ dhammamacchariyaṁ vaṇṇamacchariyanti
anya-e0102n10:74_1: imāsu āvāsādīsu aññesaṁ sādhāraṇabhāvaṁ asahanākārena pavattāni pañca macchariyāni.
anya-e0102n10:75_0: Vipallāsāti aniccadukkhaanattaasubhesuyeva vatthūsu “niccaṁ sukhaṁ attā subha”nti evaṁ pavatto saññāvipallāso
anya-e0102n10:76_0: Ganthāti nāmakāyassa ceva rūpakāyassa ca ganthanato abhijjhādayo cattāro.
anya-e0102n10:78_2: asaṁvutehi vā dvārehi ghaṭachiddehi udakaṁ viya savanato niccapaggharaṇaṭṭhena saṁsāradukkhassa vā savanato
anya-e0102n10:79_1: ārammaṇaviyogassa ceva dukkhaviyogassa ca appadānato yogātipi tesaññeva adhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:81_0: Parāmāsoti tassa tassa dhammassa sabhāvaṁ atikkamma parato abhūtaṁ sabhāvaṁ āmasanākārena pavattanato micchādiṭṭhiyā etaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:82_0: Upādānānīti sabbākārena paṭiccasamuppādaniddese vuttāni kāmupādānādīni cattāri.
anya-e0102n10:83_0: Anusayāti thāmagataṭṭhena kāmarāgānusayo, paṭigha, māna, diṭṭhi,
anya-e0102n10:83_4: Te hi thāmagatattā punappunaṁ kāmarāgādīnaṁ uppattihetubhāvena anusentiyevāti anusayā.
anya-e0102n10:84_0: Malāti telañjanakalalaṁ viya sayañca asuddhattā, aññesañca asuddhabhāvakaraṇato lobhadosamohā tayo.
anya-e0102n10:85_0: Akusalakammapathāti akusalakammabhāvena ceva duggatīnañca pathabhāvena pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṁ kāmesumicchācāro
anya-e0102n10:85_1: musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhīti ime dasa.
anya-e0102n10:86_0: Akusalacittuppādāti lobhamūlā aṭṭha dosamūlā dve mohamūlā dveti ime dvādasa.
anya-e0102n10:87_1: Iti etesaṁ saṁyojanādīnaṁ dhammānaṁ etāni yathāyogaṁ pahānakarāni. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0102n10:87_2: Saṁyojanesu tāva sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso apāyagamanīyā ca kāmarāgapaṭighāti ete pañca dhammā paṭhamañāṇavajjhā,
anya-e0102n10:87_6: Paratopi ca yattha yattha evasaddena niyamaṁ na karissāma.
anya-e0102n10:87_8: so so purimañāṇehi hatāpāyagamanīyādibhāvova hutvā upariñāṇavajjho hotīti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n10:89_0: Micchattesu micchādiṭṭhi musāvādo micchākammanto micchāājīvoti ime paṭhamañāṇavajjhā,
anya-e0102n10:90_2: yase ca pasaṁsāya ca anunayo catutthañāṇavajjhoti eke.
anya-e0102n10:91_3: asubhe subhanti diṭṭhivipallāso cāti ime paṭhamañāṇavajjhā,
anya-e0102n10:97_0: Upādānesu sabbesampi lokiyadhammānaṁ vatthukāmavasena kāmāti āgatattā rūpārūparāgopi kāmupādāne patati,
anya-e0102n10:100_0: Akusalakammapathesu pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṁ micchācāro musāvādo micchādiṭṭhīti ime paṭhamañāṇavajjhā,
anya-e0102n10:101_0: Akusalacittuppādesu cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayuttā vicikicchāsampayutto cāti pañca paṭhamañāṇavajjhāva,
anya-e0102n10:102_2: Tena vuttaṁ “iti etesaṁ saṁyojanādīnaṁ dhammānaṁ etāni yathāyogaṁ pahānakarānī”ti.
anya-e0102n10:103_1: Kiṁ panetāni ete dhamme atītānāgate pajahanti udāhu paccuppanneti.
anya-e0102n10:103_10: na ca paccuppannakileso cittavippayutto nāma atthīti.
anya-e0102n10:105_13: na paccuppanne kilese pajahatī”ti sabbaṁ paṭikkhipitvā,
anya-e0102n10:105_17: natthi dhammābhisamayo”ti pañhāpariyosāne “na hi natthi maggabhāvanā…pe…
anya-e0102n10:105_18: natthi dhammābhisamayo”ti paṭijānitvā “yathā kathaṁ viyā”ti vutte idaṁ vuttaṁ –
anya-e0102n10:106_7: evameva uppādo hetu uppādo paccayo kilesānaṁ nibbattiyāti uppāde ādīnavaṁ disvā anuppāde cittaṁ pakkhandati,
anya-e0102n10:106_8: anuppāde cittassa pakkhandattā ye āyūhanapaccayā kilesā nibbatteyyuṁ,
anya-e0102n10:106_15: anāyūhane cittassa pakkhandattā ye āyūhanapaccayā kilesā nibbatteyyuṁ,
anya-e0102n10:107_3: Bhūmiladdhā pana kiṁ atītānāgatā udāhu paccuppannāti.
anya-e0102n10:108_3: Ārammaṇarasaṁ anubhavitvā niruddhaṁ anubhūtāpagatasaṅkhātaṁ kusalākusalaṁ uppādādittayaṁ anuppatvā niruddhaṁ
anya-e0102n10:108_5: “Yānissa tāni pubbekatāni kammānī”ti evamādinā nayena vuttaṁ kammaṁ atītampi samānaṁ aññaṁ vipākaṁ paṭibāhitvā
anya-e0102n10:108_6: attano vipākassokāsaṁ katvā ṭhitattā tathā katokāsañca vipākaṁ anuppannampi samānaṁ evaṁ kate okāse ekantena
anya-e0102n10:108_8: Tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu asamūhataṁ akusalaṁ bhūmiladdhuppannaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n10:109_1: Ettha ca bhūmiyā bhūmiladdhassa ca nānattaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:109_2: Bhūmīti hi vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā tebhūmakā pañcakkhandhā.
anya-e0102n10:109_3: Bhūmiladdhaṁ nāma tesu khandhesu uppattirahaṁ kilesajātaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:109_4: Tenahi sā bhūmi laddhā nāma hotīti tasmā bhūmiladdhanti vuccati,
anya-e0102n10:109_6: Ārammaṇavasena hi sabbepi atītānāgate pariññātepi ca khīṇāsavānaṁ khandhe ārabbha kilesā uppajjanti mahākaccānauppalavaṇṇādīnaṁ
anya-e0102n10:109_8: Yadi ca taṁ bhūmiladdhaṁ nāma siyā,
anya-e0102n10:109_9: tassa appaheyyato na koci bhavamūlaṁ pajaheyya.
anya-e0102n10:109_11: Yattha yattha hi vipassanāya apariññātā khandhā uppajjanti,
anya-e0102n10:109_12: tattha tattha uppādato pabhuti tesu vaṭṭamūlaṁ kilesajātaṁ anuseti.
anya-e0102n10:110_1: Tattha ca yassa yesu khandhesu appahīnaṭṭhena anusayitā kilesā,
anya-e0102n10:110_2: tassa te eva khandhā tesaṁ kilesānaṁ vatthu,
anya-e0102n10:110_4: Atītakkhandhesu ca appahīnānusayitānaṁ kilesānaṁ atītakkhandhāva vatthu, na itare.
anya-e0102n10:110_6: Tathā kāmāvacarakkhandhesu appahīnānusayitānaṁ kilesānaṁ kāmāvacarakkhandhāva vatthu, na itare.
anya-e0102n10:110_8: Sotāpannādīsu pana yassa yassa ariyapuggalassa khandhesu taṁ taṁ vaṭṭamūlaṁ kilesajātaṁ tena tena maggena pahīnaṁ,
anya-e0102n10:110_9: tassa tassa te te khandhā pahīnānaṁ tesaṁ tesaṁ vaṭṭamūlakilesānaṁ avatthuto bhūmīti saṅkhaṁ na labhanti.
anya-e0102n10:110_10: Puthujjanassa sabbasova vaṭṭamūlakilesānaṁ appahīnattā yaṁkiñci kariyamānaṁ kammaṁ kusalaṁ akusalaṁ vā hoti.
anya-e0102n10:111_2: Yathā hi mahārukkhe pathavītalaṁ adhiṭṭhāya pathavīrasañca āporasañca nissāya tappaccayā mūlakhandhasākhapasākhapallavapalāsapupphaphalehi
anya-e0102n10:111_3: vaḍḍhitvā nabhaṁ pūretvā yāva kappāvasānā bījaparamparāya rukkhapaveṇiṁ santānayamāne ṭhite taṁ pathavīrasādi mūleyeva,
anya-e0102n10:112_0: Yathā pana tasseva rukkhassa pupphaphalādīsu nibbinno koci puriso catūsu disāsu maṇḍūkakaṇṭakaṁ nāma visakaṇṭakaṁ ākoṭeyya,
anya-e0102n10:112_1: atha so rukkho tena visasamphassena phuṭṭho pathavīrasaāporasānaṁ pariyādiṇṇattā appasavanadhammataṁ āgamma puna santānaṁ nibbattetuṁ na sakkuṇeyya,
anya-e0102n10:112_2: evameva khandhapavattiyaṁ nibbinno kulaputto tassa purisassa catūsu disāsu rukkhe visayojanaṁ viya attano santāne catumaggabhāvanaṁ ārabhati.
anya-e0102n10:112_3: Athassa so khandhasantāno tena catumaggavisasamphassena sabbaso vaṭṭamūlakakilesānaṁ pariyādiṇṇattā kiriyabhāvamattaupagatakāyakammādisabbakammappabhedo
anya-e0102n10:112_4: hutvā āyatiṁ punabbhavānabhinibbattanadhammataṁ āgamma bhavantarasantānaṁ nibbattetuṁ na sakkoti.
anya-e0102n10:112_5: Kevalaṁ carimaviññāṇanirodhena nirindhano viya jātavedo anupādāno parinibbāyati,
anya-e0102n10:112_6: evaṁ bhūmiyā bhūmiladdhassa ca nānattaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:113_3: Cakkhādīnaṁ pana āpāthagate ārammaṇe pubbabhāge anuppajjamānampi kilesajātaṁ ārammaṇassa adhiggahitattā
anya-e0102n10:113_4: eva aparabhāge ekantena uppattito ārammaṇādhiggahituppannanti vuccati,
anya-e0102n10:113_5: kalyāṇigāme piṇḍāya carato mahātissattherassa visabhāgarūpadassanena uppannakilesajātaṁ viya.
anya-e0102n10:113_6: Samathavipassanānaṁ aññataravasena avikkhambhitaṁ kilesajātaṁ cittasantatimanārūḷhampi uppattinivārakassa hetuno abhāvā avikkhambhituppannaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n10:113_7: Samathavipassanāvasena pana vikkhambhitampi ariyamaggena asamūhatattā uppattidhammataṁ anatītatāya asamūhatuppannanti vuccati,
anya-e0102n10:113_8: ākāsena gacchantassa aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino therassa kusumitarukkhe upavane pupphāni uccinantassa madhurena
anya-e0102n10:113_9: sarena gāyato mātugāmassa gītasavanena uppannakilesajātaṁ viya.
anya-e0102n10:113_10: Tividhampi cetaṁ ārammaṇādhiggahitāvikkhambhitaasamūhatuppannaṁ bhūmiladdheneva saṅgahaṁ gacchatīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:114_1: Iccetasmiṁ vuttappabhede uppanne yadetaṁ vattamānabhūtāpagatokāsakatasamudācārasaṅkhātaṁ catubbidhaṁ uppannaṁ,
anya-e0102n10:114_2: taṁ amaggavajjhattā kenacipi ñāṇena pahātabbaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0102n10:114_4: tassa taṁ uppannabhāvaṁ vināsayamānaṁ yasmā taṁ taṁ lokiyalokuttarañāṇaṁ uppajjati,
anya-e0102n10:119_0: Saccābhisamayakālaṁ hi etesu catūsu ñāṇesu ekekassa ekakkhaṇe pariññā pahānaṁ sacchikiriyā bhāvanāti etāni pariññādīni cattāri kiccāni vuttāni,
anya-e0102n10:120_0: “Yathā padīpo apubbaṁ acarimaṁ ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni karoti,
anya-e0102n10:120_5: evameva maggañāṇaṁ apubbaṁ acarimaṁ ekakkhaṇe cattāri saccāni abhisameti,
anya-e0102n10:120_11: Nirodhaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karitvā cattāripi saccāni pāpuṇāti passati paṭivijjhatī”ti.
anya-e0102n10:123_7: evaṁ kilesapariyādānaṁ nirodhaṁ sacchikarotīti evaṁ upamāsaṁsandanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:124_2: yathā sūriyo udayanto apubbaṁ acarimaṁ saha pātubhāvā cattāri kiccāni karoti,
anya-e0102n10:124_16: evaṁ kilesapaṭippassaddhiṁ nirodhaṁ sacchikarotīti evaṁ upamāsaṁsandanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:125_2: yathā nāvā apubbaṁ acarimaṁ ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni karoti,
anya-e0102n10:125_16: evaṁ pārimatīrabhūtaṁ nirodhaṁ sacchikarotīti evaṁ upamāsaṁsandanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:126_1: Evaṁ saccābhisamayakālasmiṁ ekakkhaṇe catunnaṁ kiccānaṁ vasena pavattañāṇassa panassa soḷasahākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri kiccāni ekapaṭivedhāni honti. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n10:127_1: Soḷasahi ākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri kiccāni ekapaṭivedhāni.
anya-e0102n10:127_21: Imehi soḷasahi ākārehi tathaṭṭhena cattāri saccāni ekasaṅgahitāni.
anya-e0102n10:127_25: taṁ ekena ñāṇena paṭivijjhatīti cattāri saccāni ekapaṭivedhānī”ti.
anya-e0102n10:128_1: Tattha siyā yadā dukkhādīnaṁ aññepi rogagaṇḍādayo atthā atthi,
anya-e0102n10:128_6: Dukkhaṁ ārabbha yā uppajjati paññā pajānanā”tiādinā hi nayena ekekasaccārammaṇavasenāpi saccañāṇaṁ vuttaṁ. “Yo,
anya-e0102n10:128_9: samudayampi so passatī”tiādinā nayena ekaṁ saccaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā sesesupi kiccanipphattivasenāpi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:129_0: Tattha yadā ekekaṁ saccaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karoti,
anya-e0102n10:129_1: tadā samudayadassanena tāva sabhāvato pīḷanalakkhaṇassāpi dukkhassa,
anya-e0102n10:129_2: yasmā taṁ āyūhanalakkhaṇena samudayena āyūhitaṁ saṅkhataṁ rāsikataṁ,
anya-e0102n10:129_5: tasmāssa maggassa dassanena santāpaṭṭho āvibhavati āyasmato nandassa accharādassanena sundariyā anabhirūpabhāvo viya.
anya-e0102n10:129_6: Avipariṇāmadhammassa pana nirodhassa dassanenassa vipariṇāmaṭṭho āvibhavatīti vattabbamevettha natthi.
anya-e0102n10:130_1: dukkhadassanena nidānaṭṭho āvibhavati asappāyabhojanato uppannabyādhidassanena bhojanassa byādhinidānabhāvo viya.
anya-e0102n10:131_4: sopi ca sappaccayattā saṅkhatoyevāti appaccayadhammassa asaṅkhatabhāvo ativiya pākaṭo hoti.
anya-e0102n10:132_4: paramasukhumāni rūpāni passato “vippasannaṁ vata me cakkhū”nti cakkhussa vippasannabhāvo viya.
anya-e0102n10:132_6: anekarogāturakapaṇajanadassanena issarajanassa uḷārabhāvo viyāti evamettha salakkhaṇavasena ekekassa,
anya-e0102n10:132_7: aññasaccadassanavasena ca itaresaṁ tiṇṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ āvibhāvato ekekassa cattāro cattāro atthā vuttā.
anya-e0102n10:132_8: Maggakkhaṇe pana sabbe cete atthā ekeneva dukkhādīsu catukiccena ñāṇena paṭivedhaṁ gacchantīti.
anya-e0102n10:134_0: 844. Idāni yāni tāni pariññādīni cattāri kiccāni vuttāni, tesu –
anya-e0102n10:135_0: Tividhā hoti pariññā, tathā pahānampi sacchikiriyāpi;
anya-e0102n10:136_0: Dve bhāvanā abhimatā, vinicchayo tattha ñātabbo.
anya-e0102n10:137_0: 845.Tividhā hoti pariññāti ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññāti evaṁ pariññā tividhā hoti.
anya-e0102n10:137_1: Tattha “abhiññāpaññā ñātaṭṭhena ñāṇa”nti evaṁ uddisitvā “ye ye dhammā abhiññātā honti,
anya-e0102n10:137_2: te te dhammā ñātā hontī”ti evaṁ saṅkhepato, “sabbaṁ,
anya-e0102n10:137_8: abhiññeyya”ntiādinā nayena vitthārato vuttā ñātapariññā nāma.
anya-e0102n10:138_1: “Pariññāpaññā tīraṇaṭṭhena ñāṇa”nti evaṁ uddisitvā pana “ye ye dhammā pariññātā honti,
anya-e0102n10:138_2: te te dhammā tīritā hontī”ti evaṁ saṅkhepato, “sabbaṁ,
anya-e0102n10:138_8: pariññeyya”ntiādinā nayena vitthārato vuttā tīraṇapariññā nāma.
anya-e0102n10:138_9: Tassā kalāpasammasanato paṭṭhāya aniccaṁ dukkhamanattāti tīraṇavasena pavattamānāya yāva anulomā āveṇikā bhūmi.
anya-e0102n10:139_1: “Pahānapaññā pariccāgaṭṭhena ñāṇa”nti evaṁ pana uddisitvā “ye ye dhammā pahīnā honti,
anya-e0102n10:139_2: te te dhammā pariccattā hontī”ti evaṁ vitthārato vuttā “aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṁ pajahatī”tiādinayappavattā pahānapariññā.
anya-e0102n10:139_3: Tassā bhaṅgānupassanato paṭṭhāya yāva maggañāṇā bhūmi,
anya-e0102n10:140_2: te niyamato ñātā ceva tīritā ca honti,
anya-e0102n10:140_3: tasmā pariññāttayampi iminā pariyāyena maggañāṇassa kiccanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:141_0: 848.Tathā pahānampīti pahānampi hi vikkhambhanappahānaṁ tadaṅgappahānaṁ samucchedappahānanti pariññā viya tividhameva hoti.
anya-e0102n10:141_1: Tattha yaṁ sasevāle udake pakkhittena ghaṭena sevālassa viya tena tena lokiyasamādhinā nīvaraṇādīnaṁ paccanīkadhammānaṁ vikkhambhanaṁ,
anya-e0102n10:141_3: Pāḷiyaṁ pana “vikkhambhanappahānañca nīvaraṇānaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ bhāvayato”ti nīvaraṇānaññeva vikkhambhanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0102n10:141_5: Nīvaraṇāni hi jhānassa pubbabhāgepi pacchābhāgepi na sahasā cittaṁ ajjhottharanti,
anya-e0102n10:142_1: Yaṁ pana rattibhāge samujjalitena padīpena andhakārassa viya tena tena vipassanāya avayavabhūtena ñāṇaṅgena
anya-e0102n10:143_0: Yaṁ vā pana aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāya.
anya-e0102n10:144_1: Tattha yathā aniccānupassanādīhi sattahi niccasaññādīnaṁ pahānaṁ hoti,
anya-e0102n10:145_0: Khayānupassanāti pana ghanavinibbhogaṁ katvā aniccaṁ khayaṭṭhenāti evaṁ khayaṁ passato ñāṇaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:149_0: Evaṁ vuttā paccakkhato ceva anvayato ca saṅkhārānaṁ bhaṅgaṁ disvā tasmiññeva bhaṅgasaṅkhāte nirodhe adhimuttatā,
anya-e0102n10:149_3: “te evaṁ vayadhammā”ti vipassato āyūhane cittaṁ na namati.
anya-e0102n10:150_0: Vipariṇāmānupassanāti rūpasattakādivasena taṁ taṁ paricchedaṁ atikkamma aññathāpavattidassanaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:150_1: Uppannassa vā jarāya ceva maraṇena ca dvīhākārehi vipariṇāmadassanaṁ,
anya-e0102n10:151_0: Animittānupassanāti aniccānupassanāva, tāya niccanimittassa pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:153_0: Suññatānupassanāti anattānupassanāva, tāya “atthi attā”ti abhinivesassa pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:157_0: Evaṁ vuttā rūpādiārammaṇaṁ jānitvā tassa ca ārammaṇassa tadārammaṇassa ca cittassa bhaṅgaṁ disvā “saṅkhārāva bhijjanti,
anya-e0102n10:157_2: na añño koci atthī”ti bhaṅgavasena suññataṁ gahetvā pavattā vipassanā.
anya-e0102n10:157_3: Sā adhipaññā ca dhammesu ca vipassanāti katvā adhipaññādhammavipassanāti vuccati,
anya-e0102n10:157_4: tāya niccasārābhāvassa ca attasārābhāvassa ca suṭṭhu diṭṭhattā sārādānābhinivesassa pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:158_1: tena “ahosiṁ nu kho ahaṁ atītamaddhāna”ntiādivasena ceva,
anya-e0102n10:158_2: “issarato loko sambhotī”tiādivasena ca pavattassa sammohābhinivesassa pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:159_1: tena “kiñci allīyitabbaṁ na dissatī”ti ālayābhinivesassa pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:160_0: Paṭisaṅkhānupassanāti muñcanassa upāyakaraṇaṁ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṁ, tena appaṭisaṅkhāya pahānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n10:161_1: Tadā hissa cittaṁ īsakapoṇe padumapalāse udakabindu viya sabbasmā saṅkhāragatā patilīyati,
anya-e0102n10:161_5: kāmasaṁyogādikassa kilesābhinivesassa kilesappavattiyā pahānaṁ hotīti attho.
anya-e0102n10:161_7: Pāḷiyaṁ pana “tadaṅgappahānañca diṭṭhigatānaṁ nibbedhabhāgiyaṁ samādhiṁ bhāvayato”ti saṅkhepeneva vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:162_1: Yaṁ pana asanivicakkābhihatassa rukkhassa viya ariyamaggañāṇena saṁyojanādīnaṁ dhammānaṁ yathā na puna pavatti,
anya-e0102n10:162_4: Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ “samucchedappahānañca lokuttaraṁ khayagāmimaggaṁ bhāvayato”ti.
anya-e0102n10:162_5: Iti imesu tīsu pahānesu samucchedappahānameva idha adhippetaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:162_6: Yasmā pana tassa yogino pubbabhāge vikkhambhanatadaṅgappahānānipi tadatthāneva,
anya-e0102n10:162_7: tasmā pahānattayampi iminā pariyāyena maggañāṇassa kiccanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:162_8: Paṭirājānaṁ vadhitvā rajjaṁ pattena hi yampi tato pubbe kataṁ,
anya-e0102n10:163_0: 852.Sacchikiriyāpīti lokiyasacchikiriyā lokuttarasacchikiriyāti dvedhā bhinnāpi lokuttarāya dassanabhāvanāvasena bhedato tividhā hoti.
anya-e0102n10:163_2: paṭhamajjhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”tiādinā nayena āgatā paṭhamajjhānādīnaṁ phassanā lokiyasacchikiriyā nāma.
anya-e0102n10:163_3: Phassanāti adhigantvā “idaṁ mayā adhigata”nti paccakkhato ñāṇaphassena phusanā.
anya-e0102n10:163_4: Imameva hi atthaṁ sandhāya “sacchikiriyā paññā phassanaṭṭhe ñāṇa”nti uddisitvā “ye ye dhammā sacchikatā honti,
anya-e0102n10:163_5: te te dhammā phassitā hontī”ti sacchikiriyaniddeso vutto.
anya-e0102n10:164_0: Apica attano santāne anuppādetvāpi ye dhammā kevalaṁ aparappaccayena ñāṇena ñātā,
anya-e0102n10:166_3: Tasmā dassanabhāvanāvasena nibbānassa sacchikiriyā imassa ñāṇassa kiccanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n10:167_0: 853.Dvebhāvanā abhimatāti bhāvanā pana lokiyabhāvanā lokuttarabhāvanāti dveyeva abhimatā.
anya-e0102n10:167_6: Lokuttarāni hi sīlādīni catubbidhampetaṁ ñāṇaṁ uppādeti.
anya-e0102n10:167_7: Tesaṁ sahajātapaccayāditāya tehi ca santānaṁ vāsetīti lokuttarabhāvanāvassa kiccanti.
anya-e0102n10:172_0: “Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṁ paññañca bhāvaya”nti. –
anya-e0102n10:173_0: Evaṁ sarūpeneva ābhatāya paññābhāvanāya vidhānadassanatthaṁ yaṁ vuttaṁ “mūlabhūtā dve visuddhiyo sampādetvā
